item.title: Regeneron is buying 23andMe out of bankruptcy for $256 million
item.description: The deal still needs court approval.

item.title: What to expect at Fortune’s Most Powerful Women International Summit this week
item.description: Fortune's Most Powerful Women International Summit starts on Tuesday.

item.title: What companies need to know about Trump’s looming DEI deadline
item.description: Companies are preparing for the next battle in President Donald Trump’s war on corporate diversity, equity and inclusion policies.

item.title: Memorial Day travel set to break 20-year-old record with 45 million Americans taking trips
item.description: Like last year, about 87% of travelers are driving to their Memorial Day destinations, AAA said.

item.title: Parent groups are hosting fairs that showcase phones with limited features to try and keep children away from smartphones
item.description: The fairs, where “dumb” or restricted phones are exhibited to parents, have been popping up around the U.S.
